description:
A Monika wallpaper that will say something every once in a while. :)
It was written in a short period of time, so I apologize for any bugs or weird issues.

Here's some answers to some questions you may have:

Q: How often does she talk?
A: Once per hour. It's intended to only distract you every once in a while.

Q: Can the lines be customized?
A: Yup, just change them in the MonikaLines.json file within the directory for this wallpaper.

Q: Why doesn't the outer space background look identical to how it looks in the game?
A: Couldn't figure out how to replicate it. If someone can share a method for replicating the effect in PIXI.js, I will add.

Q: How come the images look kind of low-res?
A: Up-scaled them from the originals. If someone can provide a higher quality version for 1080p, I will (probably) fix.

Q: How do I set up my name?
A: It should show you at the start. Just find the directory and edit the Name.txt.

Q: Can you combine this will Live2D?
A: Yup, but I'm not going to waste time on making the model. If someone can provide a fully functional Live2D Monika, then I'll add it (if I'm not feeling lazy).
title: Monika (Talking Edition)
